00043 class test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick  : public RegressionSuite, public RegressionCheck
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     int numPassed;
00047     int numFailed;
00048     std::string testDir;
00049     std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00050     std::set<std::string> setIgnore;
00051     std::vector<std::string> vSixFiles;

00053 
00054   std::string m_OutPrefix;
00055   std::vector<std::string> m_ToCompare;
00056 
00057   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00058     return equivalency(m_OutPrefix, m_ToCompare);
00059   }

00061     test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick()
00062     {
00063         numPassed = 0;
00064         numFailed = 0;
00065 
00066         // Header paramters to ignore
00067         setIgnore.insert("FileCreationTime");
00068         setIgnore.insert("FileIdentifier");
00069         setIgnore.insert("program-version");
00070         setIgnore.insert("create_date");
00071         setIgnore.insert("create-date");
00072         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-verbose");
00073         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-exec-guid");
00074         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-program-cvs-id");
00075         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-version-to-report");
00076         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-command-line");
00077         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-mem-usage");
00078         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-run-probeset-genotype");
00079         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cels");
00080         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-out-dir");
00081         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-time-start");
00082         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-free-mem-at-start");
00083 
00084         // Data Set columns to ignore (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00085         setIgnore.insert("MultiData.CopyNumber.SmoothSignal");
00086         setIgnore.insert("Segments.CN.SegmentID");
00087         setIgnore.insert("Segments.LOH.SegmentID");
00088         setIgnore.insert("Segments.CNNeutralLOH.SegmentID");
00089         setIgnore.insert("Segments.NormalDiploid.SegmentID");
00090         setIgnore.insert("Segments.Mosaicism.SegmentID");
00091         setIgnore.insert("Segments.NoCall.SegmentID");
00092 
00093         // File tags to check for equivalency
00094         vSixFiles.push_back("NA06985_GW6_C");
00095         vSixFiles.push_back("NA06993_GW6_C");
00096         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07000_GW6_C");
00097         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07019_GW6_C");
00098         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07029_GW6_C");
00099         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07056_GW6_C");
00100 
00101         vOneFile.push_back("NA07029_GW6_C");
00102     }
00103 
00104     void execute(const std::string& str) {
00105       std::string cmd = Fs::convertCommandToUnc(str);
00106       if (system(cmd.c_str()) != 0) {Err::errAbort("Execution failed for command: " + cmd);}
00107     }
00108 
00109     bool equivalency(const std::string& name, std::vector<string>& vFileTags)
00110     {
00111         bool bPassed = true;
00112         AffxString strFileName1;
00113         AffxString strFileName2;
00114         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00115         for(unsigned int i = 0; (i < vFileTags.size()); i++)
00116         {
00117             strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/copy-number/GenomeWideSNP_6/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.CNCHP";
00118             strFileName2 = Fs::join(testDir, "qt-GenomeWideSNP_6", name ) + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.CNCHP";
00119             if (!Calvin::equivalent(strFileName1, strFileName2, setIgnore, mapEpsilon, 0.0001, 1.0, false)) {bPassed = false;}
00120 
00121 //            strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/copy-number/GenomeWideSNP_6/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.cyto2.cychp";
00122 //            strFileName2 = "test-generated/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.cyto2.cychp";
00123 //            if (!Calvin::equivalent(strFileName1, strFileName2, setIgnore, mapEpsilon, 0.0001, false)) {bPassed = false;}
00124         }
00125         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00126         if (bPassed) {numPassed++;} else {numFailed++;}
00127         return bPassed;
00128     }

00163     void copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels_cancer()
00164     {
00165         execute("./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00166              --verbose 3 \
00167              --run-geno-qc false \
00168              --cychp-output true \
00169              --cnchp-output true \
00170              --text-output true \
00171              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \
00172              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00173              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00174              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00175              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00176              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00177              --o " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels_cancer \
00178              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00179              ");
00180 
00181         equivalency("copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels_cancer", vOneFile);
00182     }

00184     void copynumber_HapMap270_for_Carl()
00185     {
00186         execute("./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00187              --verbose 3 \
00188              --run-probeset-genotype false \
00189              --run-geno-qc true \
00190              --cychp-output true \
00191              --cnchp-output true \
00192              --text-output false \
00193              --qca-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.qca \
00194              --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.qcc \
00195              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \
00196              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00197              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00198              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00199              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00200              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00201              --o " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_HapMap270_for_Carl \
00202              --cel-files ../../../../../../cyto2/cyto2_cel-files/upd_trio/CELFileList.txt \
00203              ");
00204     }

00206     void copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels()
00207     {
00208       string outdir = testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels";
00209       //Fs::rm_rf(outdir, false);
00210       vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00211       m_OutPrefix = "copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels";
00212       m_ToCompare = vOneFile;
00213       checks.push_back(this);
00214       string name = "qt-copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels";
00215       string command = "./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00216              --verbose 3 \
00217              --run-geno-qc false \
00218              --cychp-output false \
00219              --cnchp-output true \
00220              --text-output true \
00221              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \
00222              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00223              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00224              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00225              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00226              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00227              --o " + outdir + " \
00228              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00229              ";
00230       RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks, false);
00231       test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-workflow.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00232       if(!test.pass()) {
00233         Verbose::out(1, "Error in::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00234       }
00235     }

00243              --cychp-output true \
00244              --cnchp-output true \
00245              --text-output true \
00246              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \

00248              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00249              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00250              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00251              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00252              --o " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels_probeset_ids \
00253              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00254              ");

00260     {

00262       //Fs::rm_rf(outdir, false);

00264       m_OutPrefix =  "copynumber_HapMap270_6_cels";
00265       m_ToCompare = vSixFiles;
00266       checks.push_back(this);
00267       string name = "qt-copynumber_HapMap270_6_cels";
00268       string command = "./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00269              --verbose 3 \
00270              --run-geno-qc false \
00271              --cychp-output false \
00272              --cnchp-output true \
00273              --text-output true \
00274              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \
00275              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00276              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00277              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00278              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00279              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00280              --o " + outdir + " \
00281              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06985_GW6_C.CEL \
00282              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06993_GW6_C.CEL \
00283              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07000_GW6_C.CEL \
00284              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07019_GW6_C.CEL \
00285              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00286              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07056_GW6_C.CEL \
00287              ";
00288       RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks, false);
00289       test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-workflow.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00290       if(!test.pass()) {
00291         Verbose::out(1, "Error in::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00292       }
00293

00296     void reference_6_cels()
00297     {
00298       string outdir = testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels";
00299       //Fs::rm_rf(outdir, false);
00300       vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00301       m_OutPrefix = "reference_6_cels";
00302       m_ToCompare = vSixFiles;
00303       checks.push_back(this);
00304       string name = "qt-reference_6_cels";
00305         Fs::rm(testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels/CNReference.a5.ref", false);
00306        string command = "./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00307              --verbose 3 \
00308              --run-geno-qc false \
00309              --cychp-output false \
00310              --cnchp-output true \
00311              --text-output true \
00312              --reference-output " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels/CNReference.a5.ref \
00313              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00314              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00315              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00316              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00317              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00318              --o " + outdir + " \
00319              --temp-dir " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels \
00320              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06985_GW6_C.CEL \
00321              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06993_GW6_C.CEL \
00322              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07000_GW6_C.CEL \
00323              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07019_GW6_C.CEL \
00324              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00325              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07056_GW6_C.CEL \
00326              ";
00327 
00328       RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks, false);
00329       test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-workflow.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00330       if(!test.pass()) {
00331         Verbose::out(1, "Error in::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00332       }
00333     }

00335     void reference_6_cels_med_norm()
00336     {
00337         Fs::rm(testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels_med_norm/CNReference.a5.ref", false);
00338         execute("./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00339              --verbose 3 \
00340              --normalization-type 2 \
00341              --run-geno-qc false \
00342              --cychp-output true \
00343              --cnchp-output true \
00344              --text-output true \
00345              --reference-output " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels_med_norm/CNReference.a5.ref \
00346              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00347              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00348              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00349              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00350              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00351              --o " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels_med_norm \
00352              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06985_GW6_C.CEL \
00353              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06993_GW6_C.CEL \
00354              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07000_GW6_C.CEL \

00416     void copynumber_1_cels()
00417     {
00418       string outdir = testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_1_cels";
00419       //Fs::rm_rf(outdir, false);
00420       vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00421       m_OutPrefix = "copynumber_1_cels";
00422       m_ToCompare = vOneFile;
00423       checks.push_back(this);
00424       string name = "qt-copynumber_1_cels";
00425       string command = "./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00426              --verbose 3 \
00427              --run-geno-qc false \
00428              --cychp-output false \
00429              --cnchp-output true \
00430              --text-output true \
00431              --reference-input " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels/CNReference.a5.ref \
00432              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00433              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00434              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00435              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00436              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00437              --o " + outdir + " \
00438              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00439              ";
00440       RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks, false);
00441       test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-workflow.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00442       if(!test.pass()) {
00443         Verbose::out(1, "Error in::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00444       }
00445     }

00500     void component_6_cels()
00501     {
00502         execute("./apt-probeset-genotype \
00503              -v 1 \
00504              --all-types true \
00505              --set-gender-method cn-probe-chrXY-ratio \
00506              --a5-global-file " + testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6/component_6_cels/CNReference.a5 \
00507              --analysis adapter-type-norm.StyOnlySnpRatio=0.8287.NspOnlySnpRatio=0.7960.NspOnlyCnRatio=1.4218.NspBothSnpRatio=0.9954.NspBothCnRatio=1.6392,quant-norm,pm-only,brlmm-p.CM=1.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.HARD=3.SB=0.45.KX=1.KH=1.5.KXX=0.5.KAH=-0.6.KHB=-0.6.transform=MVA.AAM=2.0.BBM=-2.0.AAV=0.06.BBV=0.06.ABV=0.06.copyqc=0.wobble=0.05.MS=1 \
00508              --qmethod-spec plier.optmethod=1.FixFeatureEffect=true \
00509              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00510              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \

00656 
00657 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00658 {
00659   try {
00660 
00661     FsTestDir testDir;
00662     testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-workflow-qt", true);
00663 
00664     ofstream logOut;
00665     string logName;
00666     logName = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "qt-test-regression-copynumber-workflow.log");
00667     Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00668     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00669     LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00670     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00671     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00672     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00673 
00674     Verbose::setLevel(3);
00675     test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick test;
00676     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00677     test.parseArgv(argv);
00678     //bool doValgrind = 
00679     test.doValgrind();
00680     string database = test.getDatabase();
00681 
00682     if ( !Fs::dirExists(test.testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6") ) {
00683       Fs::mkdirPath(test.testDir + "/qt-GenomeWideSNP_6", false);
00684     }
00685 
00686     Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-workflow");
00687 
00688     test.run();
00689 
00690     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-copynumber-workflow");
00691     logOut.close();
00692     return test.numFailed != 0;
00693   }
00694   catch(...) {
00695       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00696       return 1;
00697   }
00698   return 1;
00699 }
